item.title: My LLM Workflow as of Feb 2025
item.description: Inspired by Harper Reed’s blog post I want to document the way I am using AI. Specifically, large language models or LLMs. What I do I have to confess this first. I am unemployed at the moment, on a planned career break. So, I have all the time in the world to use any AI tool I want. I can afford to devote additional time to get familiar with any LLM-based tool.
